name: Color Switcher (WEB)
description:
Color Switcher is a puzzle game where you control a good and evil version of yourself at the same time. You'll have to pass the level for the good version of yourself and not let it touch with its opposite. 

The game was made for MiniJam in 3 days.

(Total development time about 30-35 hours)

CONTROLS

MovementW, A, S, D or ArrowsQChange color of character
EUse/DropRRestart levelEscBack to main menu
